scripts.////dev: vite build -w was failing. something about the chrome extension vite plugin and the manifest. re-saving the manifest makes -w work, but that defeats the purpose of automated watch
scripts.dev:webext: watchexec -w src/ "yarn vite build -c vite.config.webext.ts && node ./scripts/replace-manifest.cjs"
scripts.build: vite build && vite build -c vite.config.webext.ts && node ./scripts/replace-manifest.cjs
